paper_abstract: This paper presents an educational software called SIMPERF developed to allow the engineering students to learn easily and quickly about the vehicle's performance calculations. This software uses the SIMULINK library of MATLAB which has shown to be a good choice to implement and solve the implicated equations. The model allows us to achieve the vehicle's performances with enough accuracy and to modify the parameters than influence on these performances quickly and easily in order to understand the physic phenomena involved. (C) 2008 Wiley Periodicals, Inc. Comput Appl Eng Educ 17:139-147, 2009: Published online in Wiley, InterScience (www.interscience.wiley.com); DOI 10.1002/cae.20191
paper_title: SIMPERF: SIMULINK-Based Educational Software for Vehicle's Performance Estimation
